remarks: The result of the group power operator when the exponent is one. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gx1.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gx1.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gx1 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P 1 ) = A ) $.
